course_description: This course is a survey of the Federal Rules of Evidence. Prof. Carroll provides a PowerPoint before class, and classes include a lecture and interactive discussions of hypotheticals that illustrate the nuances of the rules. At least one class includes guest speakers, including practicing litigators and judges. The exam is closed book and includes multiple-choice, short answer, and an issue spotter.
